channel.title: Comments on: Death by a thousand tools
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: Oh yeah, that's an entire blog in itself :-) The cross knowledge of development platforms and actual programming ability into the current day SQL Server DBAs life. Take that and throw 500 different ways to do one thing and you have exactly that, Death by a thousand languages
item.content:encoded: Oh yeah, that’s an entire blog in itself ðŸ™‚ The cross knowledge of development platforms and actual programming ability into the current day SQL Server DBAs life. Take that and throw 500 different ways to do one thing and you have exactly that, Death by a thousand languages

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
What about death by a thousand languages, let’s see

Database Engine: T-SQL, SQLCLR, SMO
SSAS: MDX
SSRS: VB, HTML
SSIS: T-SQL, VB, C#

Powershell

And I am sure the next version will bring more goodies we will have to learn
